telemedecineSystemDesc: This project consists of a platform that allows the provision of medical services remotely, using communication technologies to connect patients and healthcare professionals
IAPredictStockPriceDesc: This project consists of a behavior and stock price prediction AI
investmentAnalysisAutomationDesc: This project consists of automating the sending of stock price analyzes by email
budgetIssuanceAutomationDesc: This project consists of automating the generation of budgets in PDF
barcodeGeneratorDesc: This project consists of a backend that, upon a web request, uses the value received to generate a barcode
linearSystemResolverDesc: This project consists of a linear systems resolver, which receives an input in CSV format representing a linear system and returns the solution of that system
educationalHistorySystemDesc: This project is the result of academic work. The school history system allows the registration of subjects and grades, in addition to providing listing and report generation functionalities
passwordGeneratorDesc: This project consists of a password generator that allows users to customize password creation according to their preferences
